shoppableVideo.title: Shoppable Video
shoppableVideo.description: A video enriched with timed, animated hotspots that can be used for user interaction.

video.title: Video
video.description: The base video that the shoppable video elements are for.

hotspots.title: Hotspots
hotspots.description: Interactable hotspots defined on the video. Each hotspot has a list of positions to move to at given times in the video.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: A timeline containing locations for the hotspot at different time points.

points.title: Points
points.description: A list of points, sorted by time.

t.title: Time (s)
t.description: The time (in seconds) of this timepoint.

p.title: Position
p.description: The position of the hotspot at the given time. In normalized range 0-1.

e.title: End Visible Section
e.description: When true, the hotspot will become invisible after this timepoint. (until the end or another timepoint)

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: The selector associated with this hotspot.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target associated with this hotspot.
